thread.title: Great hotel with great staff
thread.title_full: Great hotel with great staff - Review of Hilton Garden Inn Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: IBmama2
title: Great hotel with great staff
text: I wish I had stayed here (vs moving to the Sheraton) for my week long visit to NYC because the room had a microwave and refrigerator besides being spotless and up to date. I got this room discounted on Hotwire.com and it was surprisingly inexpensive given the location. Staff were responsive and helpful when I had some troubles with my phone. Recommend highly.
